description: Preset scenario combinations for quick switching during presentations

description.en: Medium fertility, moderate diet, balanced water management policies
description.cn: 中等生育率、均衡饮食、平衡水资源管理政策

story.en: Business-as-usual scenario representing continuation of current trends and policies.
story.cn: 常规情景，代表当前趋势和政策的延续。

description.en: Low emissions, efficient irrigation, high ecological protection
description.cn: 低排放、高效灌溉、高生态保护

story.en: Best-case scenario with aggressive climate action, technological advancement, and strong environmental policies.
story.cn: 最优情景，采取积极的气候行动、技术进步和强有力的环境政策。

description.en: High emissions, traditional practices, limited ecological protection
description.cn: 高排放、传统做法、有限生态保护

story.en: Worst-case scenario with continued high emissions, slow technological adoption, and weak environmental policies.
story.cn: 最差情景，持续高排放、技术采用缓慢、环境政策薄弱。

description.en: Rapid renewable energy adoption with enhanced water conservation
description.cn: 快速可再生能源转型与强化水资源保护

story.en: Scenario focusing on rapid renewable energy transition and water-saving technologies while maintaining ecological flows.
story.cn: 聚焦快速可再生能源转型和节水技术，同时维持生态流量的情景。

description.en: Population growth and dietary shifts increase water demand
description.cn: 人口增长和饮食转变增加用水需求

story.en: Scenario with high population growth, shifting to protein-rich diets, creating significant water demand challenges.
story.cn: 人口高增长、向富含蛋白质饮食转变的情景，带来显著的用水需求挑战。

description.en: Advanced irrigation and water-saving technologies widely adopted
description.cn: 先进灌溉和节水技术广泛采用

story.en: Scenario emphasizing widespread adoption of cutting-edge water-saving irrigation and industrial technologies.
story.cn: 强调广泛采用尖端节水灌溉和工业技术的情景。
